bugreport.Bug_name: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
bugreport.Status: New/Open/Active (Depends on the Tool you are using)

Steps_to_reproduce.b: Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User
Steps_to_reproduce.c: Filled out all the user information fields
Steps_to_reproduce.f: Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error…”

bugreport.Expected_Result: On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message “New User has been created successfully”
bugreport.Actual_Result: Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error
